text: Era mumanye nti mazima omubaka wa Katonda ali mu mmwe, singa abagondera mu bigambo ebisinga obungi (nga bwe mubiraba), mwandifunye obuzibu, naye ddala Katonda yabaagazisa obukkiriza nabulabisa bulungi eri emitima gya mmwe, na bakyayisa obukafiiri n’obwononefu n’obugyemu, (abo abataliimu mize egimenyeddwa waggulu) bo be balungamu
